attributes.action: What are you doing to repatriate UK nationals during the COVID19 CRISIS?
attributes.additional_details: Because there is very little information, advice or support from the Government, airlines, travel agents or anyone else.
attributes.background:
Repatriate UK citizens who are stranded and left to their own devices in various countries.

On a personal level, I am in Goa and require life saving medication that is unavailable here. As is the case with other nationals in other countries. We want clarity, leadership, information and advice NOW

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307260

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
